commenter_b: There are jobs women cannot do in our military, because they are unable to meet our standards.. (Combat arms) Pretending to be a man would get them in. commenter_a: Being transgender is not a mental disorder. Both the APA and the AMA agree. Also nearly every single western military in the world allows transgender people to serve openly in the military. Even Israel, a country that has significant treats to their nation allows transgender people to serve openly. Plus there are already 15,000 transgender people serving in the US military right now. Their service should be honored and not conditioned upon whether or not they can keep their gender identity a secret.
